author: Robert H. Schuller
quote: I'd rather attempt to do something great and fail than to attempt to do nothing and succeed.

author: Unknown
quote: Work while they sleep. Learn while they party. Save while they spend. Live like they dream.

author: George Lucas
quote: You simply have to put one foot in front of the other and keep going. Put blinders on and plow right ahead.

author: Horace
quote: Don't think, just do.

author: Unknown
quote: Some people don’t like change, but you need to embrace change if the alternative is disaster.

author: Og Mandino
quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.

author: Unknown
quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it, time will pass anyway.

author: Sophocles
quote: Always desire to learn something useful.

author: Unknown
quote: Being happy doesn't mean that everything is perfect. It means that you decided to look beyond the imperfections.

author: Unknown
quote: What comes easy won’t last, what lasts won’t come easy.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Always remember people who have helped you along the way, and don’t forget to lift someone up.

author: Og Mandino
quote: Always do your best. What you plant now you will harvest later.

author: Unknown
quote: With all its sham, drudgery, and broken dreams, it is still a beautiful world. Be cheerful. Strive to be happy.

author: Amelia Earhart
quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote: Get action. Seize the moment. Man was never intended to become an oyster.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: When the going gets tough, put one foot in front of the other and just keep going. Don’t give up.

author: Unknown
quote: Be stubborn about your goals and flexible about your methods.

author: Unknown
quote: Follow your passion, be prepared to work hard and sacrifice, and above all, don’t let anyone limit your dreams.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: You become what you believe.

author: Unknown
quote: Erase the old tapes in your head and create new ones.

author: Jerry West

author: Donna Brazile
quote: I was motivated to be different in part because I was different.

author: Henry Ward Beecher
quote: Ones best success comes after their greatest disappointments.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.

author: Les Brown
quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

author: Ken Venturi
quote: I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.

author: Unknown
quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

author: Unknown
quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.

author: Shakti Gawain
quote: You create your opportunities by asking for them.

author: Unknown
quote: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside while still alive. Never surrender.

author: Baltasar Gracian
quote: The wise does at once what the fool does at last.

author: Unknown
quote: Look for something positive in each day even if some days you have to look a little harder.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: If you don't like how things are, change it! You're not a tree.

author: Unknown
quote: Falling down is an accident, staying down is a choice.

author: Unknown
quote: I think everyone should be told they’re beautiful until they believe it.

author: Unknown
quote: Never stop doing great just because someone doesn’t give you credit.

author: Unknown
quote: What’s the point of being alive if you don’t at least try to do something remarkable.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Courage is feeling fear, not getting rid of fear, and taking action in the face of fear.

author: Unknown
quote: Life is short. Don’t waste it being sad. Be who you are, be happy, be free, be whatever you want to be.

author: Unknown
quote: One of the most important things you can accomplish is just being yourself.

author: Orison Swett Marden
quote: We make the world we live in and shape our own environment.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.

author: Norman Vincent Peale

author: Confucius
quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

author: Brian Tracy
quote: I've found that luck is quite predictable. If you want more luck, take more chances. Be more active. Show up more often.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: We aim above the mark to hit the mark.

author: Thomas A. Edison

author: Emile Zola
quote: If you ask me what I came into this life to do, I will tell you: I came to live out loud.

author: Tina Brown
quote: Give Obama a script he has made his own, and he is the motivational speaker to end all speakers. Tony Robbins cloned with Honest Abe.

author: Charlotte Whitton
quote: When one must, one can.

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes it’s very hard to move on, but once you move on, you’ll realize it was the best decision you’ve ever made.

author: Tom Stoppard
quote: Every exit is an entry somewhere else.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.

author: Thomas A. Edison
quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.

author: Herbert Simon
quote: One finds limits by pushing them.

author: George C. Marshall
quote: Don't fight the problem, decide it.

author: Tecumseh
quote: From my tribe I take nothing, I am the maker of my own fortune.

author: Martha Stewart
quote: I find that when you have a real interest in life and a curious life, that sleep is not the most important thing.

author: Unknown
quote: It doesn’t matter who you are, where you come from. The ability to triumph begins with you. Always.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: Do you want to know who you are? Don’t ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.

author: Ezra Pound
quote: Either move or be moved.

author: Unknown
quote: Great things come to those who don’t wait.

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

author: H. L. Hunt

author: Steve Maraboli
quote: I want to live my life in such a way that when I get out of bed in the morning, the devil says, "aw shit, he's up!

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.

author: Saint Teresa of Avila
quote: Be gentle to all and stern with yourself.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Once you realize you deserve a bright future, letting go of your dark past is the best choice you will ever make.

author: Epictetus
quote: Only the educated are free.

author: Phillips Brooks
quote: Set yourself earnestly to see what you are made to do, and then set yourself earnestly to do it.

author: Epictetus
quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.

author: Steve Maraboli
quote: At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: To have what you have never had, you have to do what you have never done.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: The strongest people find the courage and caring to help others, even if they are going through their own storm.

author: Unknown
quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.

author: Unknown
quote: Being yourself is all it takes. If you want to impress someone, don’t be someone else. Be yourself.

author: Unknown
quote: Embrace who you are. Literally, hug yourself. Accept who you are.

quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.

author: Unknown
quote: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.

author: Unknown
quote: One of the hardest things to do in life is letting go of what you thought was real.

author: Peter Marshall
quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time who never loses any. It is wonderful how much may be done if we are always doing.

quote: No matter how many goals you have achieved, you must set your sights on a higher one.

author: Steve Maraboli
quote: Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness.

quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t be pushed by your problems, be led by your dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: Whatever you decide to do. Make sure it makes you happy.

author: Unknown
quote: Letting go gives us freedom, and freedom is the only condition for happiness.

author: Unknown
quote: If you’re not happy about how you look, you have to question how much self-love you have.

author: Unknown
quote: Stop waiting for perfection and eliminate the excuses that are keeping you stuck.

quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.

author: Unknown
quote: Surround yourself with people who inspire and encourage you. Your network is your net worth.

author: Unknown

author: Unknown
quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.

author: Unknown
quote: You’re not going to master the rest of your life in one day. Just relax. Master the day. Then just keep doing that every day.

author: Unknown
quote: Beauty is about being comfortable in your own skin. It’s about knowing and accepting who you are.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: It's always too early to quit.

author: Babe Ruth
quote: You just can’t beat the person who never gives up.

author: Steve Maraboli
quote: When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.

author: Henry Ford
quote: You can’t build a reputation on what you are going to do.

author: Unknown
quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.

quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Strive not to be a success but rather to be of value.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t chase after the people that hurt you. Replace them with people that care.

quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.

quote: There has never been a meaningful life built on easy street.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t stop when you’re tired. STOP when you are DONE.

author: Unknown
quote: Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy.

quote: The more we do the more we can do.

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

quote: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.

quote: He who refuses to embrace a unique opportunity loses the prize as surely as if he had failed.

author: Unknown
quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.

author: Unknown
quote: Stop beating yourself up you are a work in progress, which means you get there a little at a time, not all at once.

author: Unknown
quote: Never let a bad situation bring out the worst in you. Choose to stay positive and be the strong person that God created you to be!

author: Unknown
quote: What makes you different makes you beautiful.

quote: The dog that trots about finds a bone.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Maturity is when you stop complaining and making excuses, and start making changes.

author: Wayne Dyer
quote: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it’s always your choice.

quote: March on. Do not tarry. To go forward is to move toward perfection. March on, and fear not the thorns, or the sharp stones on life's path.

quote: Begin to be now what you will be hereafter.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is full also of the overcoming of it.

author: Steve Maraboli
quote: Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history, but not a part of your destiny.

author: Unknown
quote: Doing what is comfortable is rarely profitable.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.

author: William Wordsworth
quote: To begin, begin.

author: Unknown
quote: A word of encouragement during a failure is worth more than an hour of praise after success.

quote: Press forward. Do not stop, do not linger in your journey, but strive for the mark set before you.

author: Bo Jackson
quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.

quote: Follow your dreams, work hard, practice and persevere. Make sure you eat a variety of foods, get plenty of exercise and maintain a healthy lifestyle.

quote: Success is the only motivational factor that a boy with character needs.

quote: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.

author: William Hazlitt
quote: The more we do, the more we can do.

author: Unknown
quote: Know the value of time. Snatch, seize, and enjoy every minute of it.

author: Unknown
quote: You will succeed because most people are lazy.

quote: If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t limit your challenges, challenge your limits.

author: Unknown
quote: If you can count your money, work harder.

author: Unknown
quote: You’re allowed to scream, you’re allowed to cry but do not give up.

quote: No matter how hard the past is, you can always begin again.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t fear failure. Fear being in the exact same place next year as you are today.

author: Unknown

author: Unknown
quote: Between stimulus and response is our greatest power –the freedom to choose.

quote: I’ve failed over and over and over again. And that is why I succeed.

quote: I want to build a legacy at the WWE, but I definitely want to continue to grow the Bella Empire. I want it to go beyond the ring. I would love to be a motivational speaker.

quote: If you don’t give up on something you truly believe in, you will find a way.

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.

quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.

quote: Everybody makes mistakes but remember to be sure to point out your own before you point out someone else’s.

author: Unknown
quote: You only fail when you stop trying.

author: Unknown
quote: Just believe in yourself. Even if you don’t, pretend that you do and at some point, you will.

quote: Circumstances are the rulers of the weak; they are but the instruments of the wise.

author: Roy T. Bennett

author: Unknown
quote: Worry about loving yourself instead of loving the idea of other people loving you.

quote: Don’t think, just do.

author: Unknown
quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.

author: Orison Swett Marden
quote: A will finds a way.

quote: Envy is the art of counting the other fellow’s blessings instead of your own.

author: Unknown
quote: A strong woman is someone who is able to smile this morning like she wasn’t crying last night.

author: Unknown
quote: You become who you spend your time with.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.

author: Unknown
quote: Just in case you have forgotten today. You matter. You are loved. You are worthy. You are magical.

author: Steve Maraboli
quote: If you hang out with chickens, you're going to cluck and if you hang out with eagles, you're going to fly.

author: Philip Sidney
quote: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.

quote: I really believe that everyone has a talent, ability, or skill that he can mine to support himself and to succeed in life.

quote: Why compare yourself with others? No one in the entire world can do a better job of being you than you.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Success is going from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.

author: Unknown
quote: You can’t please everyone, and you can’t make everyone like you.

quote: Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above it.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.

author: Les Brown
quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.

author: Unknown
quote: It doesn’t matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

quote: Learn the rules like a pro, so you can break them like an artist.

author: Unknown
quote: Formal education will make you a living. Self-education will make you a fortune.

quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

quote: Every great story on the planet happened when someone decided not to give up, but kept going no matter what.

quote: In the end, you have to choose whether or not to trust someone.

author: Unknown
quote: Everything you need to accomplish your goals is already in you.

author: Unknown
quote: Being yourself is all it takes. If you want to impress someone, don’t be someone else. Just be yourself.

author: Steve Maraboli
quote: Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.

author: Unknown
quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.

quote: You need to let go of the resentment inside of you and don’t let it shape the way your life will be in the future.

author: Persius
quote: He conquers who endures.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: Well done is better than well said.

author: Diane Sawyer
quote: Whatever you want in life, other people are going to want it too. Believe in yourself enough to accept the idea that you have an equal right to it.

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.

quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.

author: Unknown
quote: The ones who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.

quote: Crave for a thing, you will get it. Renounce the craving, the object will follow you by itself.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: It’s always too early to quit.

author: Epictetus
quote: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

author: Francis Chan
quote: Our greatest fear should not be of failure but of succeeding at things in life that don’t really matter.

author: George Adair
quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.

quote: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.

author: Unknown
quote: I know it has been tough but I still cheering for you.

quote: Times will change for the better when you change.

quote: God is not punishing you, he is preparing you. Trust his plans not your pain.

quote: Do it, move it, make it happen! No one ever sat their way to success.

quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.

quote: Hold on to what is good, even if it’s a handful of earth.

author: Steve Maraboli
quote: Sometimes life knocks you on your ass... get up, get up, get up!!! Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

author: Stevie Wonder
quote: If you don't ask, you don't get.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Never lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever.

author: Unknown
quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

author: Miguel de Unamuno
quote: Only he who attempts the absurd is capable of achieving the impossible.

author: Frank Sinatra
quote: The best revenge is massive success.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Pursue what catches your heart, not what catches your eyes.

author: Victor Kiam
quote: Even if you fall on your face you’re still moving forward.

author: Unknown
quote: Greatness is sifted through the grind, therefore don’t despise the hard work now for surely, it will be worth it in the end.

author: Unknown
quote: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem and smarter than you think.

author: Virgil
quote: Fortune sides with him who dares.

quote: Pursue one great decisive aim with force and determination.

quote: Good things come to people who wait, but better things come to those who go out and get them.

author: Unknown
quote: You can’t get rich thinking poor.

author: Unknown
quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for extraordinary destiny.

quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.

author: Simone Weil
quote: I can, therefore I am.

quote: Sometimes it takes an overwhelming breakdown to have an undeniable breakthrough.

author: Audrey Hepburn
quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says “I’m possible”!

author: Unknown
quote: Forgive others. Not because they deserve forgiveness but because you deserve peace.

author: Baltasar Gracian
quote: Know or listen to those who know.

author: Steve Maraboli
quote: I will not try to convince you to love me, to respect me, to commit to me. I deserve better than that; I AM BETTER THAN THAT...Goodbye.

author: Unknown
quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.

quote: The weeds keep multiplying in our garden, which is our mind ruled by fear. Rip them out and call them by name.

author: Tim Notke
quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.

author: Christopher Morley
quote: Big shots are only little shots who keep shooting.

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

author: Unknown
quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.

quote: The more man meditates upon good thoughts, the better will be his world and the world at large.

author: Unknown
quote: I’m so proud of you. I just wanted to tell you in case no one has.

author: Unknown
quote: There’s a reason for everything. This one may look like a setback. It doesn’t mean you’re failing but that God is growing you in a new way.

author: Unknown
quote: Respect people’s feelings. Even if it doesn't mean anything to you, it could mean everything to them.

author: Unknown
quote: It takes a strong person to do their own thing and not wait for anybody else to validate their existence.

quote: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.

quote: When you feel like you’re drowning in life, don’t worry

quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.

author: Jack London
quote: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.

quote: You can't expect to hit the jackpot if you don't put a few nickels in the machine.

quote: The key to life is to be around the people who will empower you to reach the next level in life.

author: Unknown
quote: No matter what’s happening, choose to be happy. Don’t focus on what’s wrong. Find something positive in your life. Thank God for the small things.

author: Unknown
quote: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

author: Unknown
quote: You have been assigned this mountain to show others it can be moved.

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

author: Unknown
quote: You didn’t come this far only to come this far.

author: Unknown
quote: The power for creating a better future is contained in the present moment: You create a good future by creating a good present.

quote: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.

quote: You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals.

quote: It’s not who you are that holds you behind, it’s who you think your are not.

quote: I’d rather attempt to do something great and fail, than to attempt nothing and succeed.

author: Unknown
quote: Decide this minute to never again beg anyone for the love, respect, and attention that you should be showing yourself.

author: Samuel Beckett
quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.

author: Christopher Reeve
quote: Don't give up. Don't lose hope. Don't sell out.

quote: Be thine own palace, or the world's thy jail.

quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.

quote: When you fail you learn from the mistakes you made and it motivates you to work even harder.

quote: Life comes with many challenges. The ones that should not scare us are the ones we can take on and take control of.

quote: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.

quote: What is called genius is the abundance of life and health.

author: Confucius
quote: It does not matter how slowly you go, so long as you do not stop.

author: Unknown
quote: Comparison is an act of violence against the self.

author: Henry Drummond
quote: The people who influence you are the people who believe in you.

author: Charles Atlas
quote: Step by step and the thing is done.

author: John W. Gardner
quote: True happiness involves the full use of one’s power and talents.

author: Carol Burnett
quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.

author: Unknown
quote: Life’s challenges are not supposed to paralyzed you, they’re supposed to help you discover who you are.

author: Unknown
quote: You will never know your limits until you push yourself to them.

author: John Burroughs
quote: If you think you can do it, you can.

author: John R. Wooden
quote: Don’t let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.

author: Unknown
quote: Some people develop a wish bone where their back bone should be.

author: Unknown
quote: Believe in yourself and you’ll be unstoppable.

author: Dennis Waitely
quote: There are two primary choices in life; to accept conditions as they exist, or to accept the responsibility for changing them.

author: Unknown
quote: Wake up. Kick ass. Repeat.

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes when you are in a dark place you think you have been buried, but actually you have been planted.

author: Unknown
quote: Letting go doesn't mean giving up, but rather accepting that there are things that cannot be.

author: Walt Disney
quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

author: Unknown
quote: You are gold, baby. Solid gold.

author: Unknown
quote: Giving up doesn't always mean you’re weak, sometimes you’re just strong enough to let go.

author: Unknown
quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.

author: Unknown
quote: There’s something in you that the world needs.

author: Les Brown
quote: When life knocks you down, try to land on your back. Because if you can look up, you can get up.

author: Rosa Parks
quote: You must never be fearful about what you are doing when it is right.

author: Robert H. Schuller
quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.

author: Albert Schweitzer
quote: Do something wonderful, people may imitate it.

author: Unknown
quote: One day, you’ll wake up and there won’t be any time to do the things you’ve always wanted. Do them now.

author: Unknown
quote: You are stronger than you know. More capable than you ever dreamed. And you are loved more than you could possibly imagine.

author: Unknown
quote: When things are going bad, don’t use that as an excuse to give up. Instead, use it as motivation to push harder. Never give up.

author: Unknown
quote: Never apologize for having high standards, people who really want to be in your life will rise to meet them.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: You must do the thing you think you cannot do.

author: Jimmy Dean
quote: Poverty was the greatest motivating factor in my life.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: If you have a strong purpose in life, you don't have to be pushed. Your passion will drive you there.

author: John Wooden
quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.

author: Christopher Columbus
quote: You can never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.

author: Unknown
quote: Self-trust is the first secret of success.

author: Unknown
quote: Hey, little fighter, soon things will be brighter.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.

author: Unknown
quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.

author: Unknown
quote: Be yourself. Everyone else is already taken.

author: Unknown
quote: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.

author: Unknown
quote: If we keep doing what we are doing, we’re going to keep getting what we’re getting.

author: Olaf Isachsen
quote: More often than not, successful entrepreneurs are givers and not takers of positive energy.

author: Unknown
quote: Just be yourself. Let people see the real, imperfect, flawed, quirky, weird, beautiful, magical person you are.

author: Abraham Lincoln
quote: Your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don’t wish it were easier, wish you were better.

author: Unknown
quote: Be a pineapple stand tall wear a crown and be sweet on the inside.

author: William Butler Yeats
quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.

author: Unknown
quote: Stop being afraid of what could go wrong and think of what could go right.

author: Unknown
quote: The more anger towards the past you carry in your heart, the less capable you are of loving in the present.

author: Unknown
quote: Always be a first-rate version of yourself instead of a second-rate version of someone else.

author: Jimmy Dean
quote: I can’t change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.

author: Sam Levenson
quote: Do not watch the clock. Do what it does. Keep going.

author: Unknown
quote: If you want to conquer fear, don’t sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.

author: Unknown
quote: Take a deep breath, it’s just a bad day not a bad life.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t mistake silence for weakness. Smart people don’t plan big moves out loud.

author: Unknown
quote: No matter what you look like or think you look like, you’re special and loved and perfect just the way you are.

author: Octavio Paz
quote: Deserve your dream.

author: Walt Disney
quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.

author: Michael Phelps
quote: There will be obstacles. There will be doubters. There will be mistakes. But with hard work, there are no limits.

author: Leo Durocher
quote: I come to win.

author: Unknown
quote: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: You are the average of the five people you spend the most time with.

author: Unknown
quote: The man on top of the mountain didn’t fall there.

author: Aldous Huxley
quote: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.

author: Unknown
quote: Confidence is the key. If you don’t believe in yourself, then nobody will.

author: Unknown
quote: Over-thinking ruins you. Ruins the situation, twists things around, makes you worry and just makes everything much worse than it actually is.

author: Unknown
quote: If you limit yourself only to what seems possible or reasonable, you disconnect yourself from what you truly want, and all that is left is compromise.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.

author: Unknown
quote: Always remember that in life, whatever we do, we are never defeated unless we give up.

author: Nikos Kazantzakis
quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.

author: Babe Ruth
quote: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.

author: Unknown
quote: Do what you have to do until you can do what you want to do.

author: Allen Ginsberg
quote: Follow your inner moonlight; don't hide the madness.

author: Norman Ralph Augustine
quote: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.

author: Unknown
quote: Whatever we believe about ourselves and our ability comes true for us.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: It’s only after you’ve stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change, grow, and transform.

author: Virgil
quote: They can conquer who believe they can.

author: Robert Henri
quote: Do whatever you do intensely.

author: Unknown
quote: I’ve never met a strong person with an easy past.

author: David Brinkley
quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.

author: Unknown
quote: I think happiness is what makes you pretty. Happy people are beautiful.

author: Unknown
quote: When you have a Million Dollar vision, don’t surround yourself with 1 cent minds.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Do what you love, love what you do, and with all your heart give yourself to it.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Dreams don't work unless you take action. The surest way to make your dreams come true is to live them.

author: Unknown
quote: You are capable of amazing things.

author: Sam Levenson
quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

author: John D. Rockefeller
quote: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.

author: Aristotle
quote: You will never do anything in this world without courage. It is the greatest quality in the mind next to honor.

author: St. Jerome
quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. Till your good is better and your better is best.

author: Steve Maraboli
quote: Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you don't.

author: Michael Korda
quote: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.

author: Unknown
quote: Hustle until you no longer need to introduce yourself.

author: Unknown
quote: When other people treat you poorly, walk away, smile and keep being you. Don’t ever let someone else’s bitterness change the person you are.

author: Unknown
quote: A little progress each day adds up to big results.

author: Unknown
quote: Time doesn't heal emotional pain, you need to learn how to let go.

author: W. Clement Stone15
quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.

author: Unknown
quote: Surround yourself with only people who are going to lift you higher.

author: Elbert Hubbard
quote: Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeed – there’s so little competition.

author: Malala Yousafzai
quote: It is very important to know who you are. To make decisions. To show who you are.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: The greatest achievement was at first, and for a time, but a dream.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Be the positive impact on the lives of others.

author: Victor Kiam
quote: Even if you fall on your face, you’re still moving forward.

author: Unknown
quote: Learn to let go. That is the key to happiness.

author: Unknown
quote: Be gentle with yourself. You’re doing the best you can!

author: Unknown
quote: God knew your life would come to this and he has a plan for you.

author: Unknown
quote: If it doesn’t challenge you, it won’t change you.

author: John W. Gardner
quote: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents.

author: Rose Kennedy
quote: I know not age, nor weariness nor defeat.

author: Chris Grosser
quote: Opportunities don’t happen, you create them.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Hitch your wagon to a star.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

author: Beverly Sills
quote: I've always tried to go a step past wherever people expected me to end up.

author: Vidal Sassoon
quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good and go for great.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.

author: Bo Jackson
quote: Set your goals high, and don’t stop till you get there.

author: Thomas Fuller
quote: One may miss the mark by aiming too high as too low.

author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
quote: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.

author: Albert Camus
quote: To know oneself, one should assert oneself.

author: Carl Sandburg
quote: To be a good loser is to learn how to win.

author: Leo Buscaglia
quote: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: Earl Nightingale has inspired more people toward success and fortune than any other motivational speaker on the planet.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: The surest way to make your dreams come true is to live them.

author: Jim Ryun
quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.

author: Unknown
quote: Beautiful girl you were made to do hard things. So believe in yourself.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: You cannot change anyone, but you can be the reason someone changes.

author: Unknown
quote: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.

author: John Dewey
quote: Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t quit. You’re already in pain. You’re already hurt. Get a reward from it.

author: Unknown
quote: A hill is just another opportunity to leave your competition behind.

author: Unknown
quote: The moment you feel like you have to prove your worth to someone is the moment to absolutely and utterly walk away.

author: Unknown
quote: If your dreams don’t scare you, they are not big enough.

author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.

author: Tiffany Trump
quote: I don't know what it's like to have a typical father figure. He's not the dad who's going to take me to the beach and go swimming, but he's such a motivational person.

author: Unknown
quote: Always believe that something wonderful is about to happen.

author: Og Mandino
quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.

author: Unknown
quote: If you can’t handle stress, you won’t manage success.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Great leaders create more leaders, not followers.

author: Unknown
quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t talk, just act. Don’t say, just show. Don’t promise, just prove.

author: Unknown
quote: Nothing in the world is more common than unsuccessful people with talent.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Be brave to stand for what you believe in even if you stand alone.

author: Unknown
quote: Make yourself a priority once in a while. It’s not selfish. It’s necessary.

author: Denis Diderot
quote: You have to make it happen.

author: W. Clement Stone
quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.

author: Truman Capote
quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.

author: Wayne Gretzky
quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.

author: Ann Richards
quote: The here and now is all we have, and if we play it right it’s all we’ll need.

author: Steve Maraboli
quote: You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.

author: Lucille Ball
quote: The more things you do, the more you can do.

author: John Burroughs
quote: A somebody was once a nobody who wanted to and did.

author: Unknown
quote: If you don’t build your dreams, someone else will hire you to build theirs.

author: Oliver Herford
quote: Many are called but few get up.

author: Jack London
quote: You can’t wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.

author: Unknown
quote: If you believe it will work out, you’ll see opportunities. If you believe it won’t, you will see obstacles.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.

author: Muhammad Ali
quote: I know where I'm going and I know the truth, and I don't have to be what you want me to be. I'm free to be what I want.

author: Walt Disney
quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.

author: Rabindranath Tagore
quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.

author: Unknown
quote: I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship.

author: Jim Carrey
quote: If you've got a talent, protect it.

author: Unknown
quote: Train yourself to find the blessing in everything.

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: It always seems impossible until it is done.

author: Unknown
quote: A little progress everyday adds up to big results.

author: Norman Cousins
quote: Your heaviest artillery will be your will to live. Keep that big gun going.

author: Arthur C. Clarke
quote: The only way of discovering the limits of the possible is to venture a little way past them into the impossible.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: You have to accept whatever comes, and the only important thing is that you meet it with the best you have to give.

author: Unknown
quote: Fortune knocks but once, but misfortune has much more patience.

author: Michael John Bobak
quote: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone.

author: Unknown
quote: Work until your idols become your rivals.

author: Philip Emeagwali
quote: The hardships that I encountered in the past will help me succeed in the future.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Without ambition one starts nothing. Without work one finishes nothing. The prize will not be sent to you. You have to win it.

author: Unknown
quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

author: Walter Elliot
quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.

author: Ralph Marston
quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.

author: Unknown
quote: Discipline is doing what needs to be done, even if you don’t want to.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: It takes guts and humility to admit mistakes. Admitting we're wrong is courage, not weakness.

author: Mark Gorman
quote: Not all dreamers are winners, but all winners are dreamers.

author: Muhammad Iqbal
quote: The ultimate aim of the ego is not to see something, but to be something.

author: Thomas Paine
quote: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.

author: Aeschylus
quote: God always strives together with those who strive.

author: Tony Robbins
quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.

author: Admiral William Frederick Halsey Jr.
quote: There are no great men. Just great challenges which ordinary men, out of necessity, are forced by circumstance to meet.

author: Unknown
quote: Those who spend their time looking for the faults in others usually make no time to correct their own.

author: Unknown
quote: Just keep moving forward and don’t give a shit about what anybody thinks. Do what you have to do, for you.

author: Unknown
quote: The Lord will fight for you. You need only to be still.

author: Stephen R. Covey
quote: Motivation is a fire from within. If someone else tries to light that fire under you, chances are it will burn very briefly.

author: Matthew Henry
quote: After a storm comes a calm.

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes you just have to give up on people. Chasing them is a heartache especially when they don’t try to meet you halfway.

author: Unknown
quote: Always remember you’re unique just like everyone else.

author: Unknown
quote: Believe and work hard and all your dreams will come true.

author: John F. Kennedy
quote: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.

author: Denis Waitley
quote: Learn from the past, set vivid, detailed goals for the future, and live in the only moment of time over which you have any control: now.

author: Eric Thomas
quote: When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe, then you’ll be successful.

author: Unknown
quote: I failed over and over and over again in my life that is why I succeed.

author: Beverly Abamo
quote: It’s not about time, it’s about choices. How are you spending your choices?

author: William James
quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.

author: Unknown
quote: Try not to take things personally; what people say about you is a reflection of them, not you.

author: Baruch Spinoza
quote: Do not weep; do not wax indignant. Understand.

author: Edgar Cayce
quote: There is progress whether ye are going forward or backward! The thing is to move!

author: Unknown
quote: When the world says 'give up', hope whispers 'try it once more'.

author: Aristotle
quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.

author: Unknown
quote: You should never regret anything in life. If it’s good, it’s wonderful. If it’s bad, it is experience.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: To be wholly devoted to some intellectual exercise is to have succeeded in life.

author: Unknown
quote: The man who has confidence in himself gains the confidence of others

author: Unknown
quote: If you have the power to make someone happy, do it. The world needs more of that.

author: Mark Caine
quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.

author: Richard Rorty
quote: There is nothing deep down inside us except what we have put there ourselves.

author: Unknown
quote: You attract what you are, not what you want. If you want great, then be great.

author: Kyle Chandler
quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Let the improvement of yourself keep you so busy that you have no time to criticize others.

author: Daniel Webster
quote: There is always room at the top.

author: Kresley Cole
quote: Nothing great ever came that easy.

author: Unknown
quote: I create new enemies every day, it’s called business.

author: Sam Levenson
quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

author: Joan of Arc
quote: I am not afraid... I was born to do this.

author: Sophocles
quote: Who seeks shall find.

author: Carol Burnett
quote: Only I can change my life. No one else can do it for me.

author: Unknown
quote: Be who you are and find yourself so you can be your own person and enjoy life with no regret.

author: George Eliot
quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

author: Lolly Daskal
quote: When you stop chasing the wrong things you give the right things a chance to catch you.

author: Unknown
quote: Remember that life’s greatest lessons are usually learned from worst times and from the worst mistakes.

author: Unknown
quote: Life is too short to wake up in the morning with regrets.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Life is about accepting the challenges along the way, choosing to keep moving forward, and savoring the journey.

author: Unknown
quote: Obsessed is the word the lazy use to describe dedicated.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: The starting point of all achievement is desire.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.

author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
quote: You must take action now that will move you towards your goals. Develop a sense of urgency in your life.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.

author: Margaret Thatcher
quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.

author: Unknown
quote: You are amazing, you are brave, you are strong.

author: Unknown
quote: When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself.

author: Unknown
quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don’t compare or compete, everyone will respect you.

author: Julie Andrews
quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.

author: Mia Hamm
quote: I've worked too hard and too long to let anything stand in the way of my goals. I will not let my teammates down and I will not let myself down.

author: J. D. Salinger
quote: How do you know you're going to do something, untill you do it?

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Never, never, never give up.

author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.

author: Unknown
quote: You are confined only by the walls you build yourself.

author: Wayne W. Dyer
quote: Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change.

author: Wayne Dyer
quote: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.

author: Henry Ford
quote: Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.

author: Neale Donald Walsh
quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.

author: Unknown
quote: Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Never stop dreaming, never stop believing, never give up, never stop trying, and never stop learning.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Discipline Your Mind to Think Positively: Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.

author: Dale Carnegie
quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no help at all.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
quote: Never complain and never explain.

author: Unknown
quote: Be selective in your battles for sometimes peace is better than being right.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.

author: Unknown
quote: The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire, not things we fear.

author: Unknown
quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
